```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
library(fontawesome)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
dcico <- as.character("/logos/dc_small.png{width=20px}")

dc_schedule <-  
  read_csv("dc.csv",
           show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
                mutate(Required = case_when(
                Required == "checked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle-check", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px")),
                Required == "unchecked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle-xmark", fill = "#d9534f", height = "15px"))
              )) %>%
            mutate(across(everything(), as.character)) %>%
              filter(Group == 9) %>% #CHANGE HERE
              select(-Group, -Chapters_wide, -`Due by_short`) %>%
              rename(`Due by` = `Due by_long`) %>%
              rename(Chapters = Chapters_long)  %>%
            filter_all(any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
            mutate(
              across(everything(), ~replace_na(.x, ""))
            ) %>%
  select_if(~!all(is.na(.))) %>%
  mutate(Link = str_replace_all(Link, "hyper", paste0("[![",dcico,"](/logos/dc-ico.png 'Slack Icon'){width=20px}]",
                           "(https://www.datacamp.com/){target='_blank'}"
  )))
  
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(dc_schedule, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cccccllc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE,
                bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover")) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(7, width = "5em") %>%
  row_spec(0:4, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;')
```
